# Introduction

This manual is intended to provide support and guidance for using the 
[IDFG PopR Website][PopR] to run population models. Models covered here include 
[Survival](#surv), [Sightability](#sight), and [IPM](#ipm).

You can contribute to this document via [GitHub][Git], where you can also make [Suggestions][GitIssues] for adding or changing content.

This manual was created by [Speedgoat][spdgt] using [bookdown](https://bookdown.org/).

To get started, choose a section from the table of contents on the left or click [here](#info) to start from the beginning.
